name: subne0ad
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

-| wi(w0, wne(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0))

comment: If the difference of two complex numbers is nonzero, they are unequal. Converse of ~ subne0d . Contrapositive of ~ subeq0bd . (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
